    question => UTF-8 string (1175) "Where an entity has a defined benefit multi-employer pension plan which is b...
    $value[3]['question']
    Where an entity has a defined benefit multi-employer pension plan which is being treated as a defined contribution pension plan due to there being a lack of available information, have the following disclosures been given:
<ul>
    <li>That the plan is defined benefit in nature;</li>
    <li>The reason why sufficient information in not available to treat the plan as a defined benefit plan;</li>
    <li>The expected contributions to the plan for the next annual reporting period;</li>
    <li>Information about any deficit or surplus in the plan that may affect the amount of future contributions, including the basis used to determine that deficit or surplus and the implications, if any, for the entity; and</li>
    <li>An indication of the level of participation of the entity in the plan compared with other entities.  If the information is available, examples of measures that might provide such an indication, include the entity’s proportion of:-
        <ul>
            <li>The total contributions;</li>
            <li>Active members;</li>
            <li>Retired members;</li>
            <li>Deferred members?</li>
        </ul>
    </li>
</ul>
